segments.text: Oh, what a lovely scene this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, so peaceful and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so cute, trying to get some cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but he seems to be doing okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, but the woman doesn't seem to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy, it's a beautiful day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like everything is just as it should be, even with the little mischief happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me feel happy and content.
segments.speaker: PAR
